definition: Russell (name)/Bertrand Arthur William, 3rd Earl Russell (1872-1970), British logician, rationalist philosopher and pacifist

sentences.english: In chapter two, how Russell proved his topic of mathematics logicism is introduced in detail.
sentences.chinese: 第二章詳細介紹了羅素對其數學邏輯主義論題的證明。

sentences.english: Ed Asner voices Carl, and newcomer Jordan Nagai voices Russell.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾愛德華艾斯納爾聲音，約旦和新長的聲音羅素。

sentences.english: Later, he was replaced by Ayer.
sentences.chinese: 後來，羅素被艾耶爾所取代。

sentences.english: D. from Harvard. By 19 he was studying metamathematics with Bertrand Russell.
sentences.chinese: 到了19歲，他開始跟隨羅素學習元數學。

sentences.english: A Hollywood actress once met the British  philosopher, Bertrand Russell.
sentences.chinese: 一位好萊塢女明星遇見了英國哲學家伯特蘭羅素。

sentences.english: Homemade stracci pasta with spicy Italian sausage, aubergine.
sentences.chinese: 辣香腸，茄子，黑橄欖，西紅柿，羅素葉醬。

sentences.english: Rosso, for example, talks about his admiration for Armani.
sentences.chinese: 例如，羅素談到他崇拜阿瑪尼。

sentences.english: This is the contradiction before which Russell's paradox put us.
sentences.chinese: 這就是羅素的矛盾律使我們面對的二律悖反。

sentences.english: Chao acted as interpreter when Bertrand Russell took a lecture tour of China.
sentences.chinese: 當年英國哲學家羅素來華巡迴講學，趙元任擔任翻譯。

sentences.english: It is situated on Russell Street which is north of the Covent Garden.
sentences.chinese: 它位於羅素街，這是北方的科芬園。

sentences.english: Russell is Jin Yuelin's teacher in the method of resolving the inductive problem and Jin Yuelin deepens Russell's inductive idea.
sentences.chinese: 在歸納問題的解決方式上，金嶽霖與羅素有師承關係。

sentences.english: Russell considers that words'meaning is their referance.
sentences.chinese: 羅素認爲一個語詞的意義就是其所指。

sentences.english: Russell is Jin Yuelin s teacher in the method of resolving the inductive problem and Jin Yuelin deepens Russells inductive idea.
sentences.chinese: 在歸納問題的解決方式上，金嶽霖與羅素有師承關係。

sentences.english: His family moved to Sydney, Australia when Russell was 4 years old.
sentences.chinese: 羅素4歲時全家搬到澳大利亞悉尼。

sentences.english: She described Russell as "the sexiest guy working in movies today".
sentences.chinese: 她說羅素是\“當今影視圈中最性感的男人\”。

sentences.english: In those ten years, among others whom I met was the British philosopher Bertrand Russell.
sentences.chinese: 在那十年中，給我印象最深的就是英國哲學家羅素。

definition: Roth (name)/Kenneth Roth (1955-), executive director of Human Rights Watch 人權觀察|人权观察[Ren2 quan2 Guan1 cha2]
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
